description: Erection of first floor rear extension incorporating store and office for existing A1 retail unit
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unreferenced Location Plan; GTD281-01FPA3; GTD281-02FPA3; GTD281-07FPA3  Received:  16 June 2019
GTD281-05FPA3; GTD281-06FPA3  Received:  17 April 2019
GTD281-04FPA3A  Received:  06 June 2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the rear extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The proposed first floor storage room and toilet shall only be used as part of and in connection with the activities of the existing retail premises on the site.  Any other commercial or residential uses would require planning permission from the Local Planning Authority for change of use.

Condition : 6 - Prior to the first use or occupation of the approved extension, full details (including manufacturer's specifications and means of enclosure) of the cycle parking provision for the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved details shall conform to current guidance such as the TfL London Cycling Design Standards in design and layout, and be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development hereby approved and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 7 - Prior to the occupation of approved extension, details of the arrangements for the storing of waste and recycled materials within the approved rear undercroft shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. Thereafter, these arrangements shall be implemented in accordance with the agreed details.
